snippet: James Cameron, director of the global hit films “Titanic” and “Avatar,” cut the ribbon on the new office of the Cameron Pace Group China in the port city of Tianjin.
abstract: James Cameron, director of the global hit films Titanic and Avatar, opens new office of the Cameron Pace Group China in Tianjin; firm will try to bring the latest in 3-D filmmaking tools to Chinese producers and directors.
lead_paragraph: James Cameron, director of the global hit films “Titanic” and “Avatar,” cut the ribbon on the new office of the Cameron Pace Group China in the port city of Tianjin.

headline.main: China Draws In an A-List Hollywood Director
headline.print_headline: China’s Thirst for 3-D Draws an A-List Hollywood Director
